comments:
We sometimes get the following exception in the log in the teardown of the CVS 
tests. A project (and its metadata area) is being deleted at the same time the 
persistant properties are being accessed.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 272 Nov 21, 2003 16:23:10.350
!MESSAGE Could not open indexed store: C:\Eclipse\Latest-Eclipse-
Drop\eclipse\runtime-test-
workspace\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.core.resources\.projects\testCheckout-
1069449786584\.properties.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.indexing.ObjectStore.commit
(ObjectStore.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.indexing.ObjectStore.close
(ObjectStore.java:86)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.indexing.IndexedStore.create
(IndexedStore.java:170)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.indexing.IndexedStore.open
(IndexedStore.java:337)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.IndexedStoreWrapper.open
(IndexedStoreWrapper.java:41)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.IndexedStoreWrapper.create
(IndexedStoreWrapper.java:96)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.IndexedStoreWrapper.getStore
(IndexedStoreWrapper.java:166)

(IndexedStoreWrapper.java:122)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.IndexedStoreWrapper.getCursor
(IndexedStoreWrapper.java:172)

(PropertyStore.java:302)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.PropertyStore.get
(PropertyStore.java:171)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.properties.PropertyManager.getProperty

	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getPersistentProperty
(Resource.java:892)
	at org.eclipse.team.core.RepositoryProvider.getProvider

	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.isSupervised

	at

(CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.java:166)

nt(SubscriberEventHandler.java:281)

org.eclipse.team.core.subscribers.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents

We need to synchronize move and delete with persistent property store access to
avoid concurrency problems.
*** Bug 47122 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 47086 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 47262 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Michael, I believe I have fixed the timing problem caused by project deletion
running concurrently with persistent property access.  I'm not 100% sure if this
is the cause of your test failure... can you let me know if you see it again
after today?

Created an attachment (id=7046)
Log file for property store bug during plugin import

I have seen the new exception while running the test cases. I can now ignore 
these properly.
